verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:52
verses.text: Meraioth his son, Amariah his son, Ahitub his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:53
verses.text: Zadok his son, Ahimaaz his son.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:54
verses.text: Now these are their dwelling places throughout their castles in their coasts, of the sons of Aaron, of the families of the Kohathites: for theirs was the lot.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:55
verses.text: And they gave them Hebron in the land of Judah, and the suburbs thereof round about it.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:56
verses.text: But the fields of the city, and the villages thereof, they gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh.
